divs: Sighting DetailsMid summer, after dark. A few friends and I were sitting on my front step enjoying the warm evening and one of my friends saw a red light in the sky that was moving very very slowly. It was above and behind my house in the western part of the sky. It was moving in a northerly direction. It was very very bright red, a lot like an LED light, very intense color. It was very high up, and looked about the same size as Jupiter is in the sky, pretty big. It moved extremely slowly-almost unnoticeably slow. We all became very excited and curious as to what it was. I ran inside and grabbed my video camera and began to film it. I have not been able to find the video since then, when I do I will definitely email it! When I zoomed in I could see the bottom of the light was flat. The object was 90% spherical but with a flat bottom. There were no noises, no flashing, although the light did pulse slowly. It would dim and then grow brighter. The whole cycle would take around 40 seconds or so. The pulsation was very easily noticed on the recording, but not so much on from the naked eye. After I had filmed it to my satisfaction I put my camera down. Then it faded from visibility, it didn't just vanish. Not sure whether it disappeared because of distance or if the light just faded to nothing. I recall being very excited, this being the second time I've seen a ufo, that I was actually able to film this one. I don't recall any communication on any level with this object.
